title: SOLD T206 EPDG Turner SGC30 Nicer
author: RayBShotz

posts.post_title: SOLD T206 EPDG Turner SGC30 Nicer
posts.post_content:
Very nice SGC 30 Terry Turner Cleveland T206 EPDG Back.
Has a very, very small spot of paper loss on back but this card is ultra clean.
No creases and brilliant color on the front.
SOLD
RayB
